<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Standard">[Wizard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=12)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 231 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

You have dabbled in the arcane arts and, through discipline and academic study, learned how to cast a few spells.

<title level="3">Multiclass Wizard characters</title>

The wizard archetype grants versatile prepared spells, perfect for characters looking to add some extra utility.

<title level="3">Additional Feats</title>

This archetype has some feats at a level other than their original level.
Such feats are marked with a \*.

[Click here for the full rules on Additional Feats](/Rules.aspx?ID=1432).
